name: YouTube Poop Castle 2
description: Something strange is happening in Hyrule Castle! First, the King won't stop giving speeches to the citizens about his pingas. And now, he is becoming the pingas! And now he is trying to close Morshu's store for not having enough pingas! Morshu will not accept this! The mystery behind this must be uncovered! Swing and slip with Morshu's rope and lamp-oil! Explode everything with bombs! Lasso enemies to yourself and use them as an extra jump! With this, not even the almighty King Harkinian can stop the shopkeeper Morshu!
